ga.election_day_info: You can vote in person on Election Day from 7 a.m. until 7 p.m. at your assigned polling place. If you are in line by 7 p.m., you will still be allowed to vote.

register.youth: Under 18? You can register to vote at 17 Â½ and vote at 18.

mail_in.dropoff_explainer: Check with your [County Elections Office](https://sos.ga.gov/county-elections-offices) to find out what drop box locations are available closest to you.
